extendedInfo.description: 1. Calculate Percents & Percentages2. Percent Discounts (sale price)3. Percent Markups (increase by)4. Percent Margin (selling price)5. Calculate Tips.6. Percentage Difference (Change)7. Percentage (what % of) i.e. x is what percentage of yTip:Enter any two values and the third is computed e.g. [23]% of [x] = 115. X will be computed (20).Customize background colors.

reviews.title: Useful
reviews.comment: Calculating percents is a simple task but this app is extremely useful and user friendly.  A+
reviews.author: Chris Leebolt

reviews.title: Best
reviews.comment: Easy to use, accurate, no annoying ads and its free,, and it deserves 5 stars
reviews.author: Mohammed Amjath

reviews.title: GREAT APP,GS3
reviews.comment: Some people may not be using this right, I did 46.00-30% and it was right 32.20 and I used 2 different ways on this app. I love this app, I am learning to do this in my head,  but until then this gets 5 stars from me.
reviews.author: Kerie Wolfe

reviews.title: superb
reviews.comment: i love this app...this app is very usefull for the purpose of calculating percentage....good job....i love it so much
reviews.author: Abdul Naveez

reviews.title: Simplistic App, Incomplete Tip Calculator
reviews.comment: Based on reviews was expecting an app to handle more complex real-world calculations. Clean UI, but NONE standard, does NOT follow latest Android guidelines. Tip calculator does NOT have tax option, ONLY tips on tax which is NOT appropriate for all situations; also does NOT allow for rounding [up] - both basic functions of a tip calculation app. A basic calculator app can more quickly do everything this app does. If you want a simplistic app with ads for simple percentage calculations, consider this one.
reviews.author: George Hall

reviews.title: Very user friendly
reviews.comment: Easy for those who r doing business in their day to day life.. worth downloading.

reviews.comment: Absolutely fantastic! I tried other calculators but they never worked the way i wanted. This one did! Yet so simply. Wow xxx

reviews.comment: This comes in handy and works great. Every should have this on their phone. This is great for figuring out prices on sale items or how much of a tip to leave.

reviews.comment: I tried to different tip calculator apps before and this one blows them both away! And NO adds! ...Great app!!!

reviews.comment: Excellent, usefull  selection of calculations. Would be 5 stars if it was not necessary to close this app and open another  to perform simple math(add, sub, mul, div) Time consuming going back and forth to accomplish tasks..

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: An excellent, useful and well made little app. Love it! It does suck that I cannot move this app to the SD card. Why did the developer block this?

reviews.comment: This app is well put together and has quickly become one of my favorite, go to, and most used apps. I like simple and easy to use apps. This is one.
